title: Yume Nikki - Give me colors (Doujinshi)
description: Monoko is a monochrome girl living in a monochrome desert. She’s never seen any color besides white and black. But one day, a girl called Madotsuki appears in front of her, covered in a lot of different colors.This one shot was uploaded to pixiv by Jirou-san, and it’s inspired by the game Yume Nikki, by kikiyama. Instead of giving a broad view of the events in the game, it focuses on the relationship between Madotsuki and Monoko.
